.. py:function:: draw(sys, ax, t, r1, r2, ld_params=None, cmap=plt.cm.copper, fill=True)

   Draw the state of the system.

   :param sys: The system
   :type sys: System
   :param ax: Axis on which to draw
   :type ax: matplotlib.pyplot.axis
   :param t: Time at which to draw snapshot of system
   :type t: float
   :param r1: Radius of the first body
   :type r1: float
   :param r2: Radius of the second body
   :type r2: float
   :param ld_params: Limb-darkening parameters for the star
   :type ld_params: optional, float
   :param cmap: Colormap for coloring the star according to ld_params
   :type cmap: optional, matplotlib.colors.Colormap
   :param fill: If true, fill transiting bodies, if false draw outlines only
   :type fill: optional, bool


.. py:function:: snapshots(sys, axs, t, r1, r2, ld_params=None, cmap=plt.cm.copper, fill=True)

   Draw a series of snapshots representing the system and multiple times.

   :param sys: The system
   :type sys: System
   :param axs: A list of axes of length len(t) on which to plot the snapshots
   :type axs: list
   :param t: Time at which to draw snapshot of system
   :type t: array
   :param r1: Radius of the first body
   :type r1: float
   :param r2: Radius of the second body
   :type r2: float
   :param ld_params: Limb-darkening parameters for the star
   :type ld_params: optional, float
   :param cmap: Colormap for coloring the star according to ld_params
   :type cmap: optional, matplotlib.colors.Colormap
   :param fill: If true, fill transiting bodies, if false draw outlines only
   :type fill: optional, bool


.. py:function:: animate(sys, fig, t, r1, r2, duration=5, ld_params=None, cmap=plt.cm.copper)

   Make an animation of the system.

   :param sys: The system
   :type sys: System
   :param fig: Figure object
   :type fig: matplotlib.pyplot.figure
   :param t: Array of times representing each frame of the animation
   :type t: array
   :param r1: Radius of the first body
   :type r1: float
   :param r2: Radius of the second body
   :type r2: float
   :param ld_params: Limb-darkening parameters for the star
   :type ld_params: optional, float
   :param cmap: Colormap for coloring the star according to ld_params
   :type cmap: optional, matplotlib.colors.Colormap

   :returns: The animation.
   :rtype: matplotlib.animation.FuncAnimation
